name: Image
description: The Image class is a powerful rendering component for displaying images in JSMacros 2D rendering contexts.
overview:
The `Image` class is a powerful rendering component for displaying images in JSMacros 2D rendering contexts. It provides comprehensive control over image positioning, sizing, coloring, rotation, and texture region selection. This class is commonly used for creating custom HUDs, overlays, GUI elements, and visual effects in Minecraft scripts.

Image instances can display portions of textures, apply color tints and transparency, support rotation transformations, and can be easily positioned relative to other elements using the built-in alignment system.

constructors.signature: new Image(x, y, width, height, zIndex, color, id, imageX, imageY, regionWidth, regionHeight, textureWidth, textureHeight, rotation)
constructors.description: Creates a new Image with the specified properties.

parameters.name: imageX
parameters.description: X coordinate in texture to start from

parameters.name: imageY
parameters.description: Y coordinate in texture to start from

parameters.name: regionWidth
parameters.description: Width of the region in texture to use

parameters.name: regionHeight
parameters.description: Height of the region in texture to use

constructors.signature: new Image(x, y, width, height, zIndex, alpha, color, id, imageX, imageY, regionWidth, regionHeight, textureWidth, textureHeight, rotation)
constructors.description: Creates a new Image with separate alpha and color values.

parameters.name: imageX
parameters.description: X coordinate in texture to start from

parameters.name: imageY
parameters.description: Y coordinate in texture to start from

parameters.name: regionWidth
parameters.description: Width of the region in texture to use

parameters.name: regionHeight
parameters.description: Height of the region in texture to use
